original_title: Seven SDIGs including Ajith Rohana transferred
original_body_lines: Seven Senior Deputy Inspector Generals of Police (SDIGs) have been transferred due to service requirements, Sri Lanka Police announced today (25 April).
Accordingly, seven SDIGs including Lalith Pathinayake, Ajith Rohana, S.C. Medawatte and W. K. Jayalath were transferred with immediate effect, it said.
